caller_intent: Jamie needs to switch from National General Insurance to Auto Homeowners Insurance due to a recent move requiring rental insurance. They are concerned about avoiding payment on the old policy and need assistance with the transition before their insurance lapses.
resolution_steps: Agent verified the caller's identity (Shelley Kirkland) and current address (525 N MLK Jr Drive, Winston Salem).
Checked the system to confirm the policy details, including the effective date (January 7) and vehicle information (2004 Kia Sorento).
Provided premium breakdown: $813.06 annually, with monthly payment options (67.81 deposit + 11 payments of $67.75).
Noted the caller's request to avoid paying National General's higher premium ($101/month).
Explained that Brandi (previous agent) was unavailable after 3 PM but offered to proceed with the new policy.
knowledge_required: Carrier-specific premium calculations (National General, Auto Homeowners)
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance internal policy management system
summary: Jamie is transitioning from National General to Auto Homeowners Insurance due to a move requiring rental coverage. The agent verified policy details, explained payment options, and confirmed the new policy's effective date. The call ended mid-explanation, requiring follow-up to finalize the switch and ensure coverage continuity.
